Articles.Content:
Can this game be downloaded to tablets, ipods, etc? Or is it only computer based?

thank you, Debbie

Welcome aboard, dcrowex!

KSP is currently only available on Windows, Linux and Mac PCs; a version for the Playstation 4 is in the works as well. If you'd like to try something similar on a mobile device I'd suggest SimpleRockets.
It'll work on a Windows 8/10 tablet, and any Intel based Android tablet modded to run Linux. Performance is likely to be horrible in either case.
You'll also need a keyboard and mouse.
I can run it on my mother's Acer Windows tablet. It has an i5 processor, but even small rockets take the physics into the yellow. It is certainly playable though.
If you want a rocket game for tablets and phones, look up Simple Rockets.
